title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, DeepSeek-R1, Phi-4, Gemma 3, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama. Run and chat with local LLMs from Python scripts or notebooks.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama. Works in Node, Bun, Deno and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama-hosted model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI). ChatGPT-like interface running entirely locally.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama. Simple fluent API to generate, chat, and embed with local models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API. Generate, chat, and pull models from Ruby apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with extra helpers for managing models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style inline assistant.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes and mini-projects showing how to combine Ollama with Python, Go, Docker, etc.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets a server chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node-selector and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client for Ollama. Simple synchronous API for generate, chat, and embeddings.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service container and exposes it to your CI pipelines.
